isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WEST COAST MAGNUM MIRRORS AND AERO MIRRORS - WEST COAST AND AERO MIRROR COMMON SERVICE PROCEDURES - Upper Axis Hardware Kit Installation

step1.para: Using (2) 5/8" sockets loosen the bolt and lock nut combination holding the upper pivot head of the "C" loop assembly to the upper door mount bracket.

Carefully remove the lock nut, brass flat washer and bellville washer. Note the brass flat washer between the upper pivot head and the bracket. Pull the pivot bolt and flat washer out of the "C" loop upper pivot head.

Install the Upper Axis Hardware Kit components by reversing Steps 1 and 2. When inserting the pivot bolt be sure the brass flat washer is between the upper pivot head and the bracket. NOTE: Tighten the pivot bolt to 68 Nm (50 lbf - ft).
